items.name: Knife
items.description: A small knife, If I knew how to lockpick, maybe this would be useful.

items.name: Wine Bottle
items.description: You are in a long hallway. There are family pictures on all of the walls.

items.name: Bowling Ball
items.description: I know I'm on a time limit here, but I wonder if I can get a strike.

items.name: Cheese
items.description: Cheese? I wonder how the rodents haven't gotten to it.

items.name: Rotten Milk
items.description: The smell makes you gag, but you see something shiny through the rotten chunks.

items.name: Pantry key
items.description: The key to the pantry, although it's covered in a gross liquid, you can make out the symbol of a pineapple

items.name: Coffee
items.description: A cup of coffee, oddly, it's still warm

items.name: Fridge
items.description: A broken fridge, the door hanging off its hinges, it has some rotten milk and some cheese inside.

items.name: Mice's Note
items.description: A note given to you by the Mice, it reads [don't forget your abc's].

items.name: Right Shoe
items.description: A broken fridge, the door hanging off its hinges, it has some rotten milk and some cheese inside.
